rdf:Description.reg:name: cataloguersNote
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has cataloguer's note
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates data to an annotation that clarifies the selection and recording of identifying attributes, relationship data, or access points for an entity.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An annotation that clarifies the selection and recording of identifying attributes, relationship data, or access points for an entity.

rdf:Description.reg:name: dateOfUsage
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has date of usage
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates data to a date or range of dates associated with the use of a name chosen as a preferred name for a person.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A date or range of dates associated with the use of a name chosen as a preferred name for a person.

rdf:Description.reg:name: explanationOfRelationship
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has explanation of relationship
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates data to information elaborating on or clarifying a relationship between related entities.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Information elaborating on or clarifying a relationship between related entities.

rdf:Description.reg:name: scopeOfUsage
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has scope of usage
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates data to a type or form of work associated with a name chosen as a preferred name for an agent.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A type or form of work associated with a name chosen as a preferred name for an agent.

rdf:Description.reg:name: sourceConsulted
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has source consulted
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates data to a resource used in determining a name, title, or other identifying attributes of an entity, or in determining a relationship between entities.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A resource used in determining the name, title, or other identifying attributes of an entity, or in determining the relationship between entities.

rdf:Description.reg:name: statusOfIdentification
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has status of identification
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates data to an indication of a level of authentication of the data identifying an entity.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An indication of a level of authentication of the data identifying an entity.
